scripts.build:android: npm run build && npx cap copy android && npx cap build android
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && npx cap copy ios && npx cap build ios
scripts.deploy:android: npm run build:android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.deploy:ios: npm run build:ios && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release
scripts.store:android: npm run build && npx cap copy android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.store:ios: npm run build:ios && cd ios/App && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -archivePath ./build/iTone.xcarchive archive
